snippet: Gordon, who has not won a championship under the Sprint Cup format that was created in 2004, is one of a handful of favorites in this year’s playoff after re-establishing his place among the elite drivers.
abstract: Nascar driver Jeff Gordon, who has not won a championship under Sprint Cup format that was created in 2004, is one of a handful of favorites in 2014’s playoff after re-establishing his place among elite drivers.
lead_paragraph: Gordon, who has not won a championship under the Sprint Cup format that was created in 2004, is one of a handful of favorites in this year’s playoff after re-establishing his place among the elite drivers.

headline.main: Jeff Gordon Seeks 5th Title After 13 Years of Driving in Circles
headline.print_headline: Seeking a 5th Title After Years of Driving in Circles
